name: Nightrealm Tales : Fantasy FPS
blurb: An intense class-based First Person Slasher for the PC. A brutal and mysterious world of high-fantasy warfare awaits!

rewards.reward: (1.) FULL copy of the game when available! (2.) Access to the closed Beta! (3.) Subscription to newsletter with inside information. (4.) Special "Backer" community forum title.

(1.) All previous rewards. (2.) Special thanks placement on our website! (3.) Thank You Postcard (8.5x5.5") on custom concept piece signed by the Producer. (4.) Digital Art Content Pack (Screenshots, Concept Art, Promo Art)

(1.) All previous rewards. (2.) Special "VIP" forum community title. (3.) Special thanks in the game credits! (4.) Download Nightrealm Tales Soundtrack (5.) Free in-game KS exclusive helmet! (6.) Limited Edition Mini Poster (8.5"x11")

(1.) All previous rewards. (2.) Access to early stage alpha-gameplay even BEFORE the closed beta! (3.) Get your name added to the game credits as "Quality Assurance Tester". (4.) Special "QA Team" community title. (5.) Access to QA Forums. (6.) Digital copy of the Limited Edition Artbook for Nightrealm Tales. (7.) Instant access to first update, no waiting, crafting or trading!

COLLECTORS EDITION BOX: Love goodies? This is the tier for you! Beautiful 8.5x7.25" game box includes: The Game, Set of 5 Collectible (5.5"x4.25") Concept Art Cards, Nightrealm Tales Gaming Mousepad, CD of Nightrealm Tales Soundtrack,  3.5x5" Mini "Nightrealm Lore & Mythos" booklet AND a special in-game Collectors Helm available ONLY to Collectors Edition users limited to just 1 of 50!\r\n\r\nThis also includes Reward Tiers 1, 2, 3 & 4.

LIMITED EDITION ART BOOK: This is a very special reward tier for a beautiful 13"x11" hardcover art book signed by the Producer. This gorgeous book includes the amazing pre-production artwork from Nightrealm Tales and is printed on the highest quality pearl photo paper. It is hardcover bound with an 8pt linen cover and wrapped in a beautiful dustjacket. Each book is also sequentially numbered between 1 and 25. \r\n\r\nThis rewards also includes Reward Tiers 1, 2, 3 & 4.

(1.) Reward tiers 1-4. (2.) Show off to other players with the 'Helm of the Archetype'. A very rare mystical helm, one of only 15 constructed that provides a burning aura to your favorite class. NOTE: Helm will be aesthetic, applies to all classes. (3.) Archetype Global T-Shirt. (4.) Get in the LORE! That's right. We work to incorporate you as a character into the lore and mythos of Nightrealm Tales! (5.) Get a custom sketch done of you/your Lore character by one of our talented artists!

(1.) Reward tiers 1-4. (2.) Work with our concept artists to create an unlockable weapon in game! This unique weapon will be described by you and completed by our talented art staff. You will help determine its unique attributes as well as its overall look, feel and name. NOTE: Weapon attributes will be balanced. Name subject to approval. (3.) Nightrealm Tales T-Shirt (Choice of Banner or Swarm). (4.) Special "Legend" Community Title. (5.) Access to all future DLC or unlockable content for free instantly.

(1.) Reward tiers 1-4. (2.) Get listed as an 'Associate Producer' on Nightrealm Tales with your sizable contribution to our cause! (3.) Special Archetype Global Producer T-Shirt (4.) One of a kind, original concept art piece signed by the artist. (5.) Work with our artists and designers on the creation of your own custom suit of armor. (6.) Special "Associate Producer" community title. (7.) Access to all future Nightrealm Tales DLC or unlockable content for FREE instantly!

(1.) Reward Tiers 1-4, 8 & 9. (2.) Get IN THE GAME as a unique character. Work with our amazing art team on integrating yourself or one of your friends as a unique character model in the game! (3.) Special concept of your character prior to release. (4.) Personal thank you call and Q&A session with members of the development team. (5.) Free copies of all future game titles by Archetype Global. (6.) Special "Producer" community title. (7.) Get listed as a 'Producer' on Nightrealm Tales credits,
